this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - pink red light pink and yellow - yarn needle - scissors final size - the diameter is 10 cm technical notes *all rounds are joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or slip stitches tomato/coaster start with light pink round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic_ring make 9 half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 9 sts *after 3 double_crochet change from light pink to red so you should have 3 light pink sections and 3 red sections round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 18 sts *continue with red round 3 chain 1 make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 27 sts *change colour to pink round 4 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 36 sts *change colour to red round 5 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first st followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 45 sts *fasten_off start with the coaster sew on three pink lines use yellow to sew on the seeds link to video https //youtu be/usd960cpvuk if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
